page.title: 01The Area
page.content: The area for us to consider can be basically divided into three distinct parts. {1.Hillsborough village and it's {immediate environs.}We will look at how it has changed, especially in the last forty years. Other topics to imvestigate will include- The Fort, The Parish Church, Council Offices, Government House, Hillsborough P.S. and Beechlawn Special School. {2.The Large Park}which will include The Agricultural Research Institude and Park Lake. { { 3.The surrounding farming areas with three categories of land-use:- a.rough pasture for cattle and sheep, b.land used for silage, c.cropping land for barley, potatoes and some wheat.
